snippet: An investigation by the Web site Deadspin found that Notre Dame linebacker Manti Te’o’s girlfriend, who was thought to have died of leukemia, never existed.
abstract: Investigation by Web site Deadspin discovers that Lennay Kekua, supposed girlfriend of Notre Dame linebacker Manti Te'o, was a fictitious person; Te'o won national sympathy and acclaim due to his excellent play following false reports of Kekua's death; remains unclear whether Te'o was duped or was party to publicity hoax.
lead_paragraph: An investigation by the Web site Deadspin found that Notre Dame linebacker Manti Te’o’s girlfriend, who was thought to have died of leukemia, never existed.

headline.seo: Story of Manti Te’o’s Girlfriend Is Revealed to Be a Hoax
headline.main: Hoax Is Revealed as Irish Star Says He Was Duped
headline.print_headline: Hoax Is Revealed As Irish Star Says He Was Duped
